title: Cannot make or receive a phone call on my Pixel phone. Receive a message "app is not responding"
content: Cannot make or receive phone calls. When receiving a call, cannot pickup call and system freezes. When making a call, recipient connects then call is dropped, pixel freezes. Messages are "System UI not responding" and "app not responding". Tried clearing storage and cache for phone app, tried factory reset, tried system with only Google standard set of apps. No solution
